core-foundation.name: core-foundation
core-foundation.description: Core foundation modules - gateway exceptions and shared types

core-helpers.name: core-helpers
core-helpers.description: Core helper modules - string processing, config, itertools

io-protocols.name: io-protocols
io-protocols.description: I/O protocol clients - MODBUS, OPC-UA, Serial, MQTT

data-processing-core.name: data-processing-core
data-processing-core.description: Core data processing - mainframe, CSV, XML parsers

data-processing-secondary.name: data-processing-secondary
data-processing-secondary.description: Secondary data processing - JSON, text, log handlers

storage.name: storage
storage.description: Storage layer - database, file store, cache

reporting.name: reporting
reporting.description: Reporting layer - report generator, email, dashboard

automation.name: automation
automation.description: Automation layer - scheduler, script runner, plugin loader

scripts.name: scripts
scripts.description: Utility scripts - lint, test runner, docs generator

global_decisions.decision: Build system migrated from distutils to setuptools; all dependencies updated for Py3.12 compatibility
global_decisions.rationale: distutils removed in Python 3.12; pycrypto abandoned — replaced with pycryptodome; all version pins updated to Py3.12-compatible ranges

global_decisions.decision: Future imports injected into all 45 Python files
global_decisions.rationale: from __future__ import absolute_import, division, print_function, unicode_literals added to prepare codebase for Py3 behavior

global_decisions.decision: Conversion units defined: 11 units across 6 waves
global_decisions.rationale: Bottom-up dependency analysis created conversion units with core-foundation as gateway (19 dependents). Critical path: 13.1 days through 6 units.
